name: Pong HD (CatDadStudios)
description: Pong HD is a futuristic remake of the classic Pong game, where two players control rectangles used as racquet to fling a ball back and forth, with the intention of scoring in the other player’s goal. This project helped me improve my knowledge of 2D physics to control movement and reaction of the ball, and persistent data to keep scores between rounds & games.
